snippet.title: Penguin Piste Trailer
snippet.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.gidge.skiingpenguin

Get your penguin to the bottom of the mountain, avoiding obstacles and collect as many coins as you can to buy all the unlockable extras!

A fast skiing action platformer with genuinely challenging levels. 

- Simple controls
- Avoid every obstacle
- Collect as many coins as you can
- Earn all the unlockable extras

Ski, board and snowbike your way down the mountain

Test your skills and timing to reach the high score on every level

https://captainisolation.games/penguin-piste/
